title: Sales Dashboard
description: An Excel-based sales dashboard that visualizes monthly revenue, product category performance, and region-wise sales using pivot tables and charts.

title: Retail Pulse BI Dashboard
description: An interactive Power BI dashboard designed for retail analytics, showcasing KPIs like revenue, profit, customer segments, and region-wise performance with slicers and drill-throughs.

title: SQL Insights - Customer Orders
description: A SQL-based analytics project where multiple queries were used to extract insights from customer and order datasets using joins, aggregations, and CTEs.

title: Loan Default Prediction
description: A machine learning model that predicts the likelihood of loan default using logistic regression and random forest, based on financial and demographic data.

title: End-to-End Data Science Project: E-commerce Sales Analysis
description: A full pipeline project including data collection (Excel), preprocessing (Python, Pandas), visualization (Power BI), and predictive modeling (ML) for forecasting future online sales performance.
